The Black d'hide chaps (g) is a part of black d'hide gold-trimmed armour that is obtained from elite Treasure Trails.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

Black d'hide chaps have received the following changes:

  • Stab Defence bonus decreased from +31 to +18.
  • Slash Defence bonus decreased from +25 to +20.
  • Crush Defence bonus decreased from +33 to +26.
  • Magic Defence bonus decreased from +28 to +23.
  • Ranged Defence bonus decreased from +31 to +26.
18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.
